reviewText: Red Skelton was the comedian of the century.  Grew up watching his TV show in black and white and the whole family never missed a show.  Great DVD.
I received the DVD in the time that was said that I would. The DVD was wonderful. I really appreciate the promptness of everything that I have purchased through Amazon.

When I was kid I always looked forward to Red Skelton's yearly show with Freddie the Free Loader
This CD brings back a lot of memories
He was one of the funniest comedians of our time
God Rest His Soull
It's worth the money spent for the laughs

This is a collection of Red's christmas shows, NOT definitive, as you would have to view everything produced by the man.

Some are touching, some are just spoofy... but it's all great
